name: Christmas Toy - Merry Christmas Gold
description:
Christmas and New Year are just around the corner and it is necessary to prepare for everybody some gifts! Toy Factories work day and night to produce a lot of toys,because children are waiting for these holidays, knowing that they will get gifts. Help Santa Claus to collect them, which would not leave anyone without a celebratory mood!

Get ready to collect toys in parts and put them on a conveyor belt. We must be careful and fast in order not to drop toy details because they will break. Every detail fits only to one type of toy and you should have time to collect it before the end of the conveyor. The game is very fun and easy for children and adults of any age. But with each level it will be more difficult to collect toys, because they need to do a lot of them!

Happy New Year and Merry Christmas!
